import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a Phone Number Assignment Order"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/registry/beta/campaigns/{id}/orders"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



To create a new Phone Number Assignment Order, you send a `POST` request
to the Orders resource. Phone Number Assignments belong to Campaigns.
A list of `phone_numbers` in E164 format is required. 

#### Permissions
The API token must include the following scopes: _Messaging_.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"Unique ID of the campaign","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"phone_numbers":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"A list of phone number in E164 format.","example":["+15558675309"]},"status_callback_url":{"type":"string","description":"Optional: Specify a URL to receive webhook notifications when your number assignment order and the number assignments that belong to it change state.","example":"https//example.com/handle_callback"}}}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"The unique id of the order.","format":"uuid"}},"required":["id"]},{"type":"object","properties":{"state":{"type":"string","description":"The current state of the order.","example":"pending"}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"processed_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":null},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"updated_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status_callback_url":{"type":"string","description":"Optional: Specify a URL to receive webhook notifications when your number assignment order and the number assignments that belong to it change state.","example":"https//example.com/handle_callback"}}}]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
